Package controller

package controller
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddAppointmentScreenController
    This class is for adding appointments to the database.
    AddCustomerScreenController
    This class is for adding customers to the database
    LoginScreenController
    This class is responsible for allowing authorized users to log in to the program.
    MainScreenController
    This class is the central hub of this project.
    ModifyAppointmentScreenController
    This class is for modifying appointments in the database.
    ModifyCustomerScreenController
    This class is for modifying customers in the database
    ReportsScreenController
    This class is for showing various reports on the data in the database.
